name: CHHapticPattern
desc: An object representing a haptic waveform.

items.name: init(events: [CHHapticEvent], parameterCurves: [CHHapticParameterCurve])
items.desc: Constructs a haptic pattern from a series of events and parameter curves.

items.name: init(events: [CHHapticEvent], parameters: [CHHapticDynamicParameter])
items.desc: Constructs a haptic pattern from a series of events and parameters.

items.name: init(dictionary: [CHHapticPattern.Key : Any])
items.desc: Creates a haptic pattern from a property list dictionary.

items.name: struct CHHapticPattern.Key
items.desc: Constants that define the keys you use to create a haptic pattern dictionary.

items.name: var duration: TimeInterval
items.desc: The duration of the haptic pattern, in seconds.

items.name: func exportDictionary() -> [CHHapticPattern.Key : Any]
items.desc: Returns the dictionary representation of the haptic pattern.
